mapper.select: select (case when location.district = 'C00' then 'Unknown' else location.district end) as district, (case when location.block = 'C00' then 'Unknown' else location.block end) as block, (case when location.panchayat = 'C00' then 'Unknown' else location.panchayat end) as panchayat from report.location_dimension location
